headline: Reassessing Welltower (WELL) Valuation After Strong FFO Growth and Improving Senior Housing Demand
summary: Fresh reports on Welltower (WELL) highlight strong momentum in its core healthcare real estate business, as double digit gains in FFO and same store NOI, powered by improving senior housing demand, draw investors back to the stock. See our latest analysis for Welltower. That earnings momentum has not gone unnoticed, with the share price now at $191.07 and a powerful year to date share price return of 53.20%, supported by a standout five year total shareholder return of 228.39%. This signals...
